verses.verse: וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> vay-Hi reached הַגּוֹרָ֗ל <WH1486> hag-go-Ral, [This] then was the lot לְמַטֵּ֛ה <WH4294> le-mat-Teh of the tribe בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei of the children יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah of Judah לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֑ם <WH4940> le-mish-pe-cho-Tam; by their families אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about גְּב֨וּל <WH1366> ge-Vul [even] to the border אֱד֧וֹם <WH123> e-Dom of Edom מִדְבַּר־ <WH4057> mid-bar- the wilderness צִ֛ן <WH6790> tzin of Zin נֶ֖גְבָּה <WH5045> Neg-bah southward מִקְצֵ֥ה <WH7097> mik-Tzeh [was] the uttermost part תֵימָֽן׃ <WH8486> tei-Man. of the south coast

וַיְהִ֤י <WH1961> vay-Hi become לָהֶם֙ <WH1992> la-Hem like גְּב֣וּל <WH1366> ge-Vul border נֶ֔גֶב <WH5045> Ne-gev, And their south מִקְצֵ֖ה <WH7097> mik-Tzeh was from the shore יָ֣ם <WH3220> yam sea הַמֶּ֑לַח <WH4417> ham-Me-lach; of the salt מִן־ <WH4480> min- from הַלָּשֹׁ֖ן <WH3956> hal-la-Shon from the bay הַפֹּנֶ֥ה <WH6437> hap-po-Neh that looketh נֶֽגְבָּה׃ <WH5045> Neg-bah. southward

וְ֠יָצָא <WH3318> Ve-ya-tza And it went out אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about מִנֶּ֜גֶב <WH5045> min-Ne-gev to the south side לְמַעֲלֵ֤ה le-ma-'a-Leh עַקְרַבִּים֙ <WH4610> 'ak-rab-Bim to Maalehacrabbim וְעָ֣בַר <WH5674> ve-'A-var and passed צִ֔נָה <WH6790> Tzi-nah, along to Zin וְעָלָ֥ה <WH5927> ve-'a-Lah and ascended up מִנֶּ֖גֶב <WH5045> min-Ne-gev on the south side לְקָדֵ֣שׁ le-ka-Desh בַּרְנֵ֑עַ <WH6947> bar-Ne-a'; unto Kadeshbarnea וְעָבַ֤ר <WH5674> ve-'a-Var and passed חֶצְרוֹן֙ <WH2696> chetz-rOn along to Hezron וְעָלָ֣ה <WH5927> ve-'a-Lah and went up אַדָּ֔רָה <WH146> 'ad-Da-rah, to Adar וְנָסַ֖ב <WH5437> ve-na-Sav and fetched a compass הַקַּרְקָֽעָה׃ <WH7173> hak-kar-Ka-'ah. to Karkaa

וְעָבַ֣ר <WH5674> ve-'a-Var [From thence] it passed עַצְמ֗וֹנָה <WH6111> atz-Mo-nah, toward Azmon וְיָצָא֙ <WH3318> ve-ya-Tza and went out נַ֣חַל <WH5158> Na-chal unto the river מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim, of Egypt; וְהָיָה ve-ha-yah כוְהָי֛וּ <WH1961> ve-ha-Yu become קתֹּצְא֥וֹת <WH8444> to-tze-'ot and the goings out הַגְּב֖וּל <WH1366> hag-ge-Vul of that coast יָ֑מָּה <WH3220> Yam-mah; were at the sea זֶה־ <WH2088> zeh- This יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> yih-Yeh become לָכֶ֖ם la-Chem גְּב֥וּל <WH1366> ge-Vul coast נֶֽגֶב׃ <WH5045> Ne-gev. this shall be your south

וּגְב֥וּל <WH1366> u-ge-Vul border קֵ֙דְמָה֙ <WH6924> ke-de-mah And the east יָ֣ם <WH3220> yam sea הַמֶּ֔לַח <WH4417> ham-Me-lach, [was] the salt עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- far קְצֵ֖ה <WH7097> ke-Tzeh [even] unto the end הַיַּרְדֵּ֑ן <WH3383> hai-yar-Den; of Jordan וּגְב֞וּל <WH1366> u-ge-Vul And [their] border לִפְאַ֤ת <WH6285> lif-'At quarter צָפ֙וֹנָה֙ <WH6828> tza-Fo-nah in the north מִלְּשׁ֣וֹן <WH3956> mil-le-Shon [was] from the bay הַיָּ֔ם <WH3220> hai-Yam, of the sea מִקְצֵ֖ה <WH7097> mik-Tzeh at the uttermost part הַיַּרְדֵּֽן׃ <WH3383> hai-yar-Den. of Jordan

וְעָלָ֤ה <WH5927> ve-'a-Lah went up הַגְּבוּל֙ <WH1366> hag-ge-Vul And the border בֵּ֣ית beit חָגְלָ֔ה <WH1031> cha-ge-Lah, to Bethhogla וְעָבַ֕ר <WH5674> ve-'a-Var and passed מִצְּפ֖וֹן <WH6828> mitz-tze-Fon along by the north לְבֵ֣ית le-Veit הָעֲרָבָ֑ה <WH1026> ha-'a-ra-Vah; of Betharabah וְעָלָ֣ה <WH5927> ve-'a-Lah went up הַגְּב֔וּל <WH1366> hag-ge-Vul, and the border אֶ֥בֶן <WH68> 'E-ven to the stone בֹּ֖הַן <WH932> Bo-han of Bohan בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son רְאוּבֵֽן׃ <WH7205> re-'u-Ven. of Reuben

וְעָלָ֨ה <WH5927> ve-'a-Lah went up הַגְּב֥וּל׀ <WH1366> hag-ge-Vul And the border דְּבִרָה֮ <WH1688> de-vi-Rah toward Debir מֵעֵ֣מֶק <WH6010> me-'E-mek from the valley עָכוֹר֒ <WH5911> 'a-chOr of Achor וְצָפ֜וֹנָה <WH6828> ve-tza-Fo-nah and so northward פֹּנֶ֣ה <WH6437> po-Neh looking אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- toward הַגִּלְגָּ֗ל <WH1537> hag-gil-Gal, toward Gilgal אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which נֹ֙כַח֙ <WH5227> no-chach that [is] before לְמַעֲלֵ֣ה <WH4608> le-ma-'a-Leh the going up אֲדֻמִּ֔ים <WH131> 'a-dum-Mim, to Adummim אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which מִנֶּ֖גֶב <WH5045> min-Ne-gev which [is] on the south side לַנָּ֑חַל <WH5158> lan-Na-chal; of the river וְעָבַ֤ר <WH5674> ve-'a-Var passed הַגְּבוּל֙ <WH1366> hag-ge-Vul and the border אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- toward מֵי־ <WH4325> mei- toward the waters עֵ֣ין 'ein שֶׁ֔מֶשׁ <WH5885> She-mesh, of Enshemesh וְהָי֥וּ <WH1961> ve-ha-Yu and the goings תֹצְאֹתָ֖יו <WH8444> to-tze-'o-Tav and the goings out אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- toward עֵ֥ין 'ein רֹגֵֽל׃ <WH5883> ro-Gel. thereof were at Enrogel

וְעָלָ֨ה <WH5927> ve-'a-Lah went up הַגְּב֜וּל <WH1366> hag-ge-Vul And the border גֵּ֣י <WH1516> gei by the valley בֶן־ <WH1121> ven- of the son הִנֹּ֗ם <WH2011> hin-Nom, of Hinnom אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to כֶּ֤תֶף <WH3802> Ke-tef side הַיְבוּסִי֙ <WH2983> hay-vu-Si of the Jebusite מִנֶּ֔גֶב <WH5045> min-Ne-gev, unto the south הִ֖יא <WH1931> hi he יְרֽוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim; the same [is] Jerusalem וְעָלָ֨ה <WH5927> ve-'a-Lah went up הַגְּב֜וּל <WH1366> hag-ge-Vul and the border אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to רֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> rosh to the top הָהָ֗ר <WH2022> ha-Har, of the mountain אֲ֠שֶׁר <WH834> 'a-Sher which עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- that פְּנֵ֤י <WH6440> pe-Nei that [lieth] before גֵֽי־ <WH1516> gei- the valley הִנֹּם֙ <WH2011> hin-Nom of Hinnom יָ֔מָּה <WH3220> Yam-mah, westward אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which בִּקְצֵ֥ה <WH7097> bik-Tzeh which [is] at the end עֵֽמֶק־ <WH6010> 'e-mek- of the valley רְפָאִ֖ים <WH7497> re-fa-'Im of the giants צָפֹֽנָה׃ <WH6828> tza-Fo-nah. northward

וְתָאַ֨ר <WH8388> ve-ta-'Ar was drawn הַגְּב֜וּל <WH1366> hag-ge-Vul And the border מֵרֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> me-Rosh from the top הָהָ֗ר <WH2022> ha-Har, of the hill אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to מַעְיַן֙ <WH4599> ma'-Yan unto the fountain מֵ֣י <WH4325> mei of the water נֶפְתּ֔וֹחַ <WH5318> nef-To-ach, of Nephtoah וְיָצָ֖א <WH3318> ve-ya-Tza and went out אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to עָרֵ֣י <WH5892> 'a-Rei to the cities הַר־ <WH2022> har- of mount עֶפְר֑וֹן <WH6085> ef-Ron; Ephron וְתָאַ֤ר <WH8388> ve-ta-'Ar was drawn הַגְּבוּל֙ <WH1366> hag-ge-Vul and the border בַּעֲלָ֔ה <WH1173> ba-'a-Lah, to Baalah הִ֖יא <WH1931> hi he קִרְיַ֥ת kir-Yat יְעָרִֽים׃ <WH7157> ye-'a-Rim. which [is] Kirjathjearim

וְנָסַב֩ <WH5437> ve-na-Sav compassed הַגְּב֨וּל <WH1366> hag-ge-Vul And the border מִבַּעֲלָ֥ה <WH1173> mib-ba-'a-Lah from Baalah יָ֙מָּה֙ <WH3220> yam-mah westward אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הַ֣ר <WH2022> har unto mount שֵׂעִ֔יר <WH8165> se-'Ir, Seir וְעָבַ֕ר <WH5674> ve-'a-Var and passed אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to כֶּ֧תֶף <WH3802> Ke-tef along unto the side הַר־ <WH2022> har- of mount יְעָרִ֛ים <WH3297> ye-'a-Rim Jearim מִצָּפ֖וֹנָה <WH6828> mitz-tza-Fo-nah on the north side הִ֣יא <WH1931> hi he כְסָל֑וֹן <WH3693> che-sa-Lon; which [is] Chesalon וְיָרַ֥ד <WH3381> ve-ya-Rad and went down בֵּֽית־ beit- שֶׁ֖מֶשׁ <WH1053> She-mesh to Bethshemesh וְעָבַ֥ר <WH5674> ve-'a-Var and passed on תִּמְנָֽה׃ <WH8553> tim-Nah. to Timnah

וְיָצָ֨א <WH3318> ve-ya-Tza went out הַגְּב֜וּל <WH1366> hag-ge-Vul And the border אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to כֶּ֣תֶף <WH3802> Ke-tef unto the side עֶקְרוֹן֮ <WH6138> 'ek-rOn of Ekron צָפוֹנָה֒ <WH6828> tza-fo-Nah northward וְתָאַ֤ר <WH8388> ve-ta-'Ar was drawn הַגְּבוּל֙ <WH1366> hag-ge-Vul and the border שִׁכְּר֔וֹנָה <WH7942> shik-ke-Ro-nah, to Shicron וְעָבַ֥ר <WH5674> ve-'a-Var and passed along הַר־ <WH2022> har- to mount הַֽבַּעֲלָ֖ה <WH1173> hab-ba-'a-Lah Baalah וְיָצָ֣א <WH3318> ve-ya-Tza and went out יַבְנְאֵ֑ל <WH2995> yav-ne-'El; unto Jabneel וְהָי֛וּ <WH1961> ve-ha-Yu and the goings תֹּצְא֥וֹת <WH8444> to-tze-'ot and the goings out הַגְּב֖וּל <WH1366> hag-ge-Vul of the border יָֽמָּה׃ <WH3220> Yam-mah. were at the sea

וּגְב֣וּל <WH1366> u-ge-Vul border יָ֔ם <WH3220> Yam, And the west הַיָּ֥מָּה <WH3220> hai-Yam-mah sea הַגָּד֖וֹל <WH1419> hag-ga-Dol [was] to the great וּגְב֑וּל <WH1366> u-ge-Vul; and the coast זֶ֠ה <WH2088> zeh This גְּב֧וּל <WH1366> ge-Vul [thereof] This [is] the coast בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> be-nei- of the children יְהוּדָ֛ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah of Judah סָבִ֖יב <WH5439> sa-Viv round about לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָֽם׃ <WH4940> le-mish-pe-cho-Tam. according to their families

וּלְכָלֵ֣ב <WH3612> u-le-cha-Lev And unto Caleb בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son יְפֻנֶּ֗ה <WH3312> ye-fun-Neh, of Jephunneh נָ֤תַן <WH5414> Na-tan he gave חֵ֙לֶק֙ <WH2506> che-lek a part בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> be-Toch among בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> be-nei- the children יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- according פִּ֥י <WH6310> pi to the commandment יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD לִֽיהוֹשֻׁ֑עַ <WH3091> li-ho-Shu-a'; to Joshua אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- קִרְיַ֥ת kir-Yat אַרְבַּ֛ע <WH7153> 'ar-Ba' Kiriath-arba אֲבִ֥י <WH1> 'a-Vi the father הָעֲנָ֖ק <WH6061> ha-'a-Nak of Anak הִ֥יא <WH1931> hi which חֶבְרֽוֹן׃ <WH2275> chev-Ron. which [city is] Hebron

וַיֹּ֤רֶשׁ <WH3423> vai-Yo-resh drove מִשָּׁם֙ <WH8033> mish-Sham there כָּלֵ֔ב <WH3612> ka-Lev, And Caleb אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שְׁלוֹשָׁ֖ה <WH7969> she-lo-Shah thence the three בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei sons הָעֲנָ֑ק <WH6061> ha-'a-Nak; of Anak אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שֵׁשַׁ֤י <WH8344> she-Shai Sheshai וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et אֲחִימַן֙ <WH289> 'a-chi-Man and Ahiman וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et תַּלְמַ֔י <WH8526> tal-Mai, and Talmai יְלִידֵ֖י <WH3211> ye-li-Dei the children הָעֲנָֽק׃ <WH6061> ha-'a-Nak. of Anak

וַיַּ֣עַל <WH5927> vai-Ya-'al And he went up מִשָּׁ֔ם <WH8033> mish-Sham, there אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- against יֹשְׁבֵ֖י <WH3427> yo-she-Vei thence to the inhabitants דְּבִ֑ר <WH1688> de-Vir; of Debir וְשֵׁם־ <WH8034> ve-shem- and the name דְּבִ֥ר <WH1688> de-Vir of Debir לְפָנִ֖ים <WH6440> le-fa-Nim before קִרְיַת־ kir-yat- סֵֽפֶר׃ <WH7158> Se-fer. [was] Kirjathsepher

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said כָּלֵ֔ב <WH3612> ka-Lev, And Caleb אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- who יַכֶּ֥ה <WH5221> yak-Keh He that smiteth אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- קִרְיַת־ kir-yat- סֵ֖פֶר <WH7158> Se-fer Kirjathsepher וּלְכָדָ֑הּ <WH3920> u-le-cha-Dah; and taketh וְנָתַ֥תִּי <WH5414> ve-na-Tat-ti it to him will I give ל֛וֹ lo אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עַכְסָ֥ה <WH5915> 'ach-Sah Achsah בִתִּ֖י <WH1323> vit-Ti my daughter לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <WH802> le-'ish-Shah. to wife

וַֽיִּלְכְּדָ֛הּ <WH3920> vai-yil-ke-Dah took עָתְנִיאֵ֥ל <WH6274> 'a-te-ni-'El And Othniel בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son קְנַ֖ז <WH7073> ke-Naz of Kenaz אֲחִ֣י <WH251> 'a-Chi the brother כָלֵ֑ב <WH3612> cha-Lev; of Caleb וַיִּתֶּן־ <WH5414> vai-yit-ten- it and he gave ל֛וֹ lo אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עַכְסָ֥ה <WH5915> 'ach-Sah him Achsah בִתּ֖וֹ <WH1323> vit-To his daughter לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <WH802> le-'ish-Shah. to wife

וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> vay-Hi came בְּבוֹאָ֗הּ <WH935> be-vo-'Ah, And it came to pass as she came וַתְּסִיתֵ֙הוּ֙ <WH5496> vat-te-si-Te-hu [unto him] that she moved לִשְׁא֤וֹל <WH7592> lish-'ol him to ask מֵֽאֵת־ <WH853> me-'et- אָבִ֙יהָ֙ <WH1> 'a-Vi-ha of her father שָׂדֶ֔ה <WH7704> sa-Deh, a field וַתִּצְנַ֖ח <WH6795> vat-titz-Nach and she lighted off מֵעַ֣ל <WH5921> me-'Al from הַחֲמ֑וֹר <WH2543> ha-cha-Mor; [her] ass וַיֹּֽאמֶר־ <WH559> vai-yo-mer- said לָ֥הּ lah כָּלֵ֖ב <WH3612> ka-Lev and Caleb מַה־ <WH4100> mah- to her What לָּֽךְ׃ Lach.
